column4: Any idea why the music player won't play my MP3's on my windows partitions?
gstreamer-mad installed?
this is all default stuff.  i can't even access the net wit it yet
because my atheros isn't working out of the box as promised
I was told to use madwifi because its made for atheros and i read a bit and it has my exact chipset
and it didn't work?
I don't have it on there yet.
i need tomove the files from this laptop (buddies) to mine via my USB flash card but its raw and windows won't format it and i can't firgure out how in linux
tried plugging it into your computer?
yes
does it mount?
hav you tired mounting on linux?
actually, try this program: http://www.universalsmartdrive.net/standard/downloads.htm
linux is supposed to mount the flash drive automatically (by plugging it in)
the links to the MSI's don't go anywhere
partition magic under windows
fdisk/parted/qtparted under linux if the disk mounts
does your drive mount in gnome by simply plugging it in to your machine
no
own a copy of partition magic?
nope but I'm sure i can "find someone who has it"
have looked up your drive's manufacture's website (they might have special utilities)
they don't have support downloads for it
